_xResult.title: A Modern Vision Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made monochrome dress with pleats
_xResult.longdesc:
Elegance hasn't lost its luster. This custom made viscose-crepe dress features a monochrome color pallet that accentuates the subtle details we love so much about this evening dress. The faux-leather sides add a touch of sass and the pleats give the bespoke midi much needed movement. You can choose any of the following customizations:

Necklines: u-neck, v-neck, jewel, keyhole

Dress Length: above knees, knee length, below knees

Sleeves: 3/4 sleeves, short sleeves

No animals were harmed to create this faux leather. The planet will thank you!
